2045.plaintext: Greatly increases Health and provides Sight Wards over time
2045.name: Ruby Sightstone
2045.description:
+360 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Ward Refresh: Holds 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE Active - Ghost Ward: Consumes a charge to place an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area for 3 minutes (maximum 3 wards placed from this item at once).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

3151.description:
+50 Ability Power
+300 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration
UNIQUE Passive: Dealing spell damage applies a damage-over-time effect for 3 seconds that deals bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's current Health per second. This bonus damage is doubled against movement-impaired units and capped at 100 damage per second vs. monsters.

(A unit is movement-impaired if it is slowed, stunned, taunted, feared, or immobilized.)

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3151.plaintext: Spell damage burns enemies for a portion of their Health

+10% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive: +2 Attack Damage per level
UNIQUE Passive: Rengar collects trophies when killing champions and gains bonus effects based on how many trophies he collects. Grants 1 trophy for kills and assists. One trophy is lost upon death.
3 Trophies: +10 Armor Penetration, +5% Cooldown Reduction
6 Trophies: +25 Movement Speed
9 Trophies: Increases the range of Rengar's leap by 150.
14 Trophies: Increases the duration of Thrill of the Hunt by 3 seconds. Additionally, Rengar's next ability used after activating Thrill of the Hunt generates 1 bonus Ferocity.
